name: ONDiGO Ltd.
description: Developer of customer relationship management platform designed to automatically sync a team's activity with Salesforce. The company's customer relationship management platform, ONDiGO, offers a mobile application that processes email, calendar, phone calls and text messages which reflect business interactions with preexisting customers in customer relationship management system and automatically builds a customer database from those interactions, enabling businesses to increase sales-productivity
one_liner: Developer of customer relationship management platform designed to automatically sync a team's activity with Salesforce. The company's customer relationship management platform, ONDiGO, offers a mobile application that processes email, calendar, phone calls and text messages which reflect business interactions with preexisting customers in customer relationship management system and automatically builds a customer database from those interactions, enabling businesses to increase sales-productivity
